release.action: Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare module to 1.0.56, to get in fixes for Agresso.

Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting module to 1.0.23, to get in changes for DGK. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare module to 1.0.55, to get in changes for DGK. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov module to 1.0.13, to get in changes for DGK.

Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.childcare module to 1.0.20, to get in changes for DGK. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare module to 1.0.54, to get in changes for DGK. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare.rvk module to 1.0.2, to get in changes for DGK.
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare module to 1.0.53, to get in changes for DGK. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare.rvk module to 1.0.1, to get in changes for DGK.

Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.fsk module to 1.0.7, to get in changes made by laddi at the request of rvk. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.message module to 1.0.2, to get in new signature and message for rvk.
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen module to 1.0.22, to get in changes to the way the version of the rb style sheet is handled.
Updated version of fsk module -> 1.0.6
Updated version of fsk module -> 1.0.5 Updated version of after school care module -> 1.0.52
Updated version of school module -> 1.0.19 Updated version of after school care module -> 1.0.50
Updated version of citizen module -> 1.0.20
Updated version of fsk module -> 1.0.4
Updated version of citizen module -> 1.0.19
Updating with updated versions of afterschoolcare and fsk bundles.
Updating with updated versions of core, builder, user and fsk bundles.
Updating with updated versions of course and fsk bundles.
[To avoid the caching problem].
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare 1.0.48] Updated version.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.childcare 1.0.18] Updated version.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool 1.0.24] Updated version.
[is.idega.block.family 1.0.5] Updated version.
[com.idega.block.school 3.1.15] Updated version.
Creating new release for update to live server for FSK.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov 1.0.11] Updated version. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen 1.0.18] Updated version.
course and platform updated to fix dwr problems
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.application 1.0.13] Updated version. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool 1.0.23] Updated version.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov 1.0.10] Updated version. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.course 1.0.4] Updated version.
[com.idega.core 3.1.49] Updated version. [com.idega.company 3.1.0] New bundle. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.fsk 1.0.1] New bundle.
[com.idega.builder 3.1.7] Updated version.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare 1.0.45] Updated version.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.course 1.0.3] Added reservation feature so it's not possible to register for the same spot more than once.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting 1.0.22] Added daemon for course payment entries for RVK Agresso. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.course 1.0.2] Implemented accounting features.
[com.idega.block.school 3.1.14] Added accounting key to school areas.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting 1.0.21] Added new block to create school accounting keys based on school type.
Added bundle and changes associated with course bundle.
Added email to message displayed for user when requesting a new password.
Refactoring/Elimination of se bundles.
Updates for new school category for after school care.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.school 1.0.13] Changed so that school change always allows access to current season.

[is.idega.block.pki 1.0.0] Implemented and released support for authentication with Icelandic PKI Certificates. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen 1.0.13] Update because of PKI modifications. [se.idega.idegaweb.commune 1.0.8] Update because of PKI modifications.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen 1.0.12] Added displaying of current email when changing user email. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen 1.0.12] Added displaying of current email in citizen finder result table.

Update to is.mentor.vefthjonusta module [1.1.3].
Better error handling and implemented sending comments in schoolChoiceApplication to be sent to Mentor
Update to is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare module [1.0.38]. Changed so that it is possible to select season when applying for placement.
Update to is.idega.idegaweb.egov.application module [1.0.10]. Changed so it hidden applications always return false when called on in canApplyForApplication.
Fixed version of citizen module is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen [1.0.10] because of upgrade of se.idega.idegaweb.commune [1.0.7]
Update to is.idega.idegaweb.egov.application module [1.0.9]. Implemented property for disabling updating "number of times clicked".
Fixed performance in ApplicationUrlRedirector, is.idega.idegaweb.egov.application [1.0.8]
Fixed dependency problem to se.idega.idegaweb.commune [1.0.7]
[com.idega.block.school 3.1.9] Added new HAS_REVIEW column to School bean. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool 3.1.18] Finished implementing review feature for schools.
[com.idega.block.school 3.1.8] Changes to school user methods. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool 3.1.17] Changes to school user methods.
Delivering update to external case system integration as required by VUF. Updated eplatform version and modules com.idega.block.process, com.idega.block.process.webservice and com.idega.block.sso
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting] Fixed manual update of Agresso. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting] Added view for accounting in workspace.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov] Added new get/set for name to AccountingEntry. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting] Added new block to fetch statistics for a given period. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Updated according to changes in AccountingEntry. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.childcare] Updated according to changes in AccountingEntry. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Updated according to changes in AccountingEntry. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.schoolmeal] Updated according to changes in AccountingEntry.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting] Added method to enable manual update of agresso table. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added new search method that allows searching by student, parent and/or payer. Also allows search by credit card numbers.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added possibility to set valid from dates on care days and refreshments. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added displaying of queue dates in all views.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Fixed incorrect fetching of contracts when a group was stored in session.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added more checks to handle corrupt data (student points to deleted user).

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added checks to handle corrupt data (student points to deleted user). [com.idega.block.school] Added checks to handle corrupt data (student points to deleted user).
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added missing application status to accounting entry fetcher to also fetch contracts that parents have applied for termination on.
[com.idega.block.school] Improved version of SchoolClassMemberComparator.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Changed so that it is only possible to select one instrument in application. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added season dropdown to application. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Changed so that students with choices for next season can't be moved between years in MusicSchoolAcceptedApplications.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added option to show a list of all students of all schools.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added season dropdown to application that uses date control to determine which seasons to display. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.school] Added season dropdown to application that uses date control to determine which seasons to display.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Changed so that sheet names in generated Excel files are never longer than 30 characters. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.childcare] Changed so that sheet names in generated Excel files are never longer than 30 characters. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Changed so that sheet names in generated Excel files are never longer than 30 characters. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.school] Changed so that sheet names in generated Excel files are never longer than 30 characters.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added possibility to filter applications by commune.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Changed localized key.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Solved problems with MusicStudentsBySchool block (shows a list of students per school). An empty excel file was shown.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added MusicStudentsBySchool block (shows a list of students per school). [com.idega.block.school] School implements now Comparable. Minor refactoring in other classes.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.school] Added possibility to have agreement information and checkbox in application.

[com.idega.block.process] Changed method in CaseBusiness to get localized case status description so that it also gets the Case itself as a parameter. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added marking of terminated students in accepted applications list. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Changed to accomodate changes in com.idega.block.process.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.musicschool] Added elementary school name as well as information about both custodians to Excel lists.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added possibility to fetch all entries when getting Navision list instead of showing only changes. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added possibility to move students between groups. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added possibility to move applications between providers.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Fixed so that it is not possible to place studens in groups not in the same season as the application. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added new excel list to contracts view. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.application] Changing localization strings.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Fixed functionality of back button in AfterSchoolCareStudentOverview.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Layout fixes.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added possibility to change all information in an application.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov] Added new getter/setter for extra information (Object) to AccountingEntry. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting] Added usage of extra information field in AccountingEntry. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Fixed so that the refreshment column isn't added to the excel file if the provider doesn't offer refreshments. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Fixed so that it is not possible to create/modify an application after having sent in one for the same season. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added possibility for the provider to remove invalid applications from their queue.
Translation updates.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting] Fixed layout of AccountingEntryFetcher. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting] Added storage of created accounting files for Navision. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare] Added name of child's current elementary school to all admin modules and lists. [is.mentor.vefthjonusta] Fixed so that a student is never added more than once into each school.

Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov, added new getter/setter for AccountingEntry. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting, finished implementing AccountingEntryFetcher. Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare, fixed validation of payer information and accounting info.
Update for delivering Agression integration for ITR
Updating is.idega.idegaweb.egov, is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschool, is.idega.idegaweb.egov.accounting and se.idega.idegaweb.commune.care modules.
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschool module to add new features in the application.
Updated com.idega.block.school module to 3.1.1
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare module to 1.0.8
Changed icelandic child_care.placing subject from vistun->plass in is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare bundle (updated to version 1.0.7)
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.application bundle version.
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare bundle version.
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.school bundle version.
Updated is.idega.idegaweb.egov.afterschoolcare bundle version.
Updated several bundle versions to accomodate for eGov accounting support.
Update to eplatform 3.1.11. Fixing xml parse error on faces-config.xml in article module that produced a startup error on Oracle Application Server.

Changed error handling for response from Mentor, updated is.mentor.vefthjonusta module from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2. Now all responses from the mentor web service other than 'Skraning tokst' or 'Skráning tókst' are regarded errors. This was requested from Mentor for Reykjavik eGov implementation.
Built new version with updated bundle versions.
Built new version on ePlatform 3.1 release for demo purposes.
